data.actual_result: The app crashes with "Well, this is awkward."
data.expected_result: The modal to purchase a Nitro gift appears.
data.short_description: After opening your Gift Inventory with a gift in it, your Discord client will crash if you click the Gift Icon in a text chat.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a gift in your inventory. (This definitely works with Nitro gifts, not sure about other gifts.) - Reload Discord (new session to show that this IS the root cause.) - Open Library > Gift Inventory. - Wait for it to load. - Go back to a text channel. - Click the gift icon next to the GIF picker and emote picker.
